Browse internet
I go to the living room, where my computer is. I locate it, switch it on and type desired URL adress in the web browser.


[WALK] <home_office> (1.319)
[WALK] <computer> (1.417)
[FIND] <computer> (1.417)
[SWITCHON] <computer> (1.417)
[FIND] <keyboard> (1.415)
[TYPE] <keyboard> (1.415)
